QuestData.Title: Lost Records
QuestData.Description:
Some of the record keepers fled to this mountain when Korthia was pulled into the Maw.
I see no sign of them, but they may have left records behind.
Take this beacon. I fashioned it using information from the previous record keepers you rescued.
It will lead you to any intact records that are on this mountain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Matrix Beacon to recover $2oa Lost Recordings.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. I should be able to extract the Primus's message from these records.
